post.body: From Your Friends at Screenrant: Where Full Screen is Still Cool!
thank you for posting that link - holy crap is that addicting; bye bye work day
that's the second time today I've seen someone use "weak sauce" - hopefully tonight's spaghetti dinner won't warrant a third
@rickmarshall I think we should talk about puppies and flowers for the rest of the week
I never said "a lot" was bad, just making an observation - and of course I'll see Dead Snow, I prefer my Nazi's bloody and dead
Actually I'm Jewish, and you don't think 5 Nazi flicks in three months is a lot?
@devincf great podcast guys, just finished listening - everyone else should listen tonight when it goes live on Cine
Yup, and my portion of the interview is in six different languages -- readers are gonna LUV it!
So you're getting a video too? I think we'll have one on Monday -- so looking forward to watching these
no shiznit - I'll write it over the weekend
Thanks, might need Year One when the time comes, and I think I still have Persia, but not Inkheart (which I need to do now)
Fact: Ed Douglas hates puppies
You're totally right. BTW, I'm curious to hear what you thought of that movie Lev gave you to watch - the Four Eyed-ish flick
I can barely buy another ice cube tray with "all that cash Cinematical pays me," let alone a whole fridge
Yes, but now they're in serious trouble -- and at the worst possible time
hopefully he'll play as well as he has the past two weeks ...
Oh c'mon, the neurotic Jew in me loves 2 Days in Paris
I sent you an email
I know Adventureland is screening for critics -- you just have to request a ticket; press screening is at the Eccles
Well she has a pulse ... so, of course you would. ;)
Hot Tub Time Machine writer explains all http://tinyurl.com/6j5cne
yay, Sundance is f**king all of us!
I think I'm almost willing to pay you all to stop talking about TDESS .. I'm seriously almost at that point -- ENUF!
why did the NY critics pick Brolin over Ledger? That's just a pick I do not get AT ALL.
weekly corporate meeting: what's a snub? what's not a snub? snub snub snub slut snub sexy Ledger snub Globes blah
40 inspirational speeches in 2 minutes - http://tinyurl.com/5wxwwa
re: video I just posted -- it's all still photos animated in final cut pro and it's called Tears
my good friend made this, very cool and kinda somber -- http://www.thefieldz.com/tears.html
from Focus -"... the film previously known as the untitled contemporary comedy directed by Sam Mendes has officially been titled Away We Go"
wow, there are so many Nazi flicks coming out
Swayze looks like a member of Poison in that Powder Blue flick (he's actually a strip club owner) -- hysterical
Biel's stripper flick trailer (w/pics) http://tinyurl.com/5zb9zz
just went on a facebook friend request binge from my other email account, and realized I don't remember who half my email contacts are
the people I work for make me very angry sometimes
we have three new TV spots for The Spirit -- http://tinyurl.com/5nt7on
figured they'd pick the one pitch I haven't exactly wrapped my head around yet
I wonder why Youth in Revolt isn't playing Sundance -- prob either sucks or not done yet, but seems like a good fit for the fest
wow, so they pushed Brother's Bloom all the way to May ... knew that was coming
should I be insulted that the company I work for didn't even invite me to their Christmas party? Not that I would've gone, but still ...
speaking of Sundance, check out all these trailers http://tinyurl.com/69t75n
back from Sundance lunch -- hearing good things about Rockwell's basketball flick
Sundance lunch meeting in the city ... and the weather is beautiful in NYC today, let me tell ya ...
um, why is the LA Times listing The Visitor as having scored a nod for Best Picture?
question of the day: why was Milk snubbed?
golden globe noms - http://tinyurl.com/6hj8p4
first image from Rockwell's Winning Season http://tinyurl.com/3vqsta
yup. steak and tater tots tonight it is
i'm getting the strangest holiday-related emails lately
ugh, have to write up a set visit from two years ago and - yay! - all my audio was just wiped out. This should be fun
leave it to the wife to re-image our computer and wipe out my audio file - cannot wait to see how much I lost. Yay for an exciting evening!
the thing I don't get about I Love You, Man is that if he has a brother, why wouldn't he just be his best man?
finally watched Let the Right One In (thanks Weinberg), and really loved it. My old girlfriends were never that cool
HA - dude tried to sell his soul on eBay - http://tinyurl.com/69b7o6
I'm down to one ice cube tray after an "accident" -- do you know what it's like for an ice cube addict to have only one ice cube tray?
this is cool: Swatch 007 Villains Collection http://tinyurl.com/5m5oof
is this Harrison Ford/Rachel McAdams in a comedy casting announcement really breaking news, Variety?
thoughts on these choose your own adventure shorts? http://tinyurl.com/9vcs5b
greatest teen abortion comedies? 1. Fast Times 2. Last American Virgin .... what else?
"When it comes down to making out, whenever possible, put on side one of Led Zeppelin IV."
dysfunctional relationship double feature tonight: 2 Days in Paris and Revolutionary Road
Listening to: Louis Armstrong, 'Back O' Town Blues'
Matt wrote up his top trailers of 2008 (post live tonight at 7pm EST) -- I don't agree with it much, except for number one
there's something weird about Anne Hathaway, and I'm trying to put my finger on it
I really don't feel like writing this piece, but I'm being paid so much money for it. Sometimes I'm such a whore.
watching: Black Snake Moan -- I just love how trashy Ricci is in this flick
the girl: "... it says the baby is now the size of an avocado; it can hear your voice." me: "fuck, that sucks."
worst MPAA ratings of 2008 http://tinyurl.com/7ywr9k
man, I really love Casino Royale
likes it when the pay cable channels do a free weekend
heading to the mall to return shit and pick up more shit (like the slippers I never got) ... and to get Sakkio for lunch (so addicting)
Rocchi has Kris Tapley on the podcast tonight (post goes live at 7pm EST) - give a listen, won't you ...
ate way too much food today, but so glad to be done with my four christmases
